architectural_notes: Favicon handling: remove/avoid hardcoded <link rel="icon" href="/favicon.ico"> if no favicon.ico exists; configure site to use PNG favicon assets instead.
known_issues: Browser is requesting /favicon.ico (missing) causing default globe favicon to appear; needs link/config updated to point to PNG favicons.

existing_features.title: Ensure the app serves a valid root favicon at `/favicon.ico` by adding `frontend/public/favicon.ico` so browsers requesting `/favicon.ico` no longer fall back to the default globe icon.

Update `frontend/index.html` favicon declarations so they reference only valid, deployed favicon assets, and ensure `/favicon.ico` is referenced for maximum browser compatibility (including optional `rel="shortcut icon"`).

new_feature_requests.summary: Fix favicon showing default globe by updating HTML to stop referencing /favicon.ico and use deployed PNG favicons; rebuild/deploy

Add/verify cache-busted PNG favicon assets exist under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` matching the filenames referenced by `frontend/index.html`: `favicon-v2-16.dim_16x16.png`, `favicon-v2-32.dim_32x32.png`, `favicon-v2-48.dim_48x48.png`, and `favicon-v2-64.dim_64x64.png`.

projectName: Fix favicon default globe by serving /favicon.ico and cache-busted PNG favicons
